name: @imec-ilabt/solid-perftest-tools
description: CLI tools to populate and flood solid servers for performance testing purposes.

scripts.build: tsc && npx rollup bin/populate/populate-lib.js --file bin/populate/populate-lib.cjs --format cjs --sourcemap inline && chmod u+x ./bin/populate/populate-main.js ./bin/flood/flood.js ./bin/flood/flood-worker.js ./bin/utils/account-file-merger.js ./bin/utils/auth-cache-merger.js
scripts.prepublish: tsc && npx rollup bin/populate/populate-lib.js --file bin/populate/populate-lib.cjs --format cjs --sourcemap inline && chmod u+x ./bin/populate/populate-main.js ./bin/flood/flood.js ./bin/flood/flood-worker.js ./bin/utils/account-file-merger.js ./bin/utils/auth-cache-merger.js

author: Wim Van de Meerssche
